name: COLESEVELAM HYDROCHLORIDE

indications.text: colesevelam hydrochloride bile acid sequestrant indicated adjunct diet exercise : reduce elevated low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl-c ) adults primary hyperlipidemia ( 1.1 ) . reduce ldl-c levels boys post-menarchal girls , 10 years 17 years age , heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia ( hefh ) , unable reach ldl-c target levels despite adequate trial diet lifestyle modification ( 1.1 ) . improve glycemic control adults type 2 diabetes mellitus ( 1.2 ) . limitations ( 1.3 ) : treatment type 1 diabetes diabetic ketoacidosis . studied fredrickson type , iii , iv , v dyslipidemias .

contraindications.text: obtain lipid parameters , including serum triglyceride ( tg ) levels , starting colesevelam hydrochloride tablets ( 2.1 ) recommended adults boys post-menarchal girls aged 10 years 17 years primary hyperlipidemia 3.75 grams daily . recommended adults type 2 diabetes mellitus 3.75 grams daily . colesevelam hydrochloride tablets taken follows ( 2.2 , 2.4 ) : take 6 tablets daily 3 tablets twice daily meal liquid .

warningsAndPrecautions: colesevelam hydrochloride tablets , 625 mg supplied white off-white , oval-shaped , film-coated tablets , printed “ col ” one side black ink available follows : bottles 180 - ndc 69452-158-25
adverseReactions: colesevelam hydrochloride contraindicated patients : serum tg concentrations > 500 mg/dl [ ( 5.1 ) ] history hypertriglyceridemia-induced pancreatitis [ ( 5.1 ) ] history bowel obstruction [ ( 5.2 ) ]
indications_original: Colesevelam hydrochloride is a bile acid sequestrant indicated as an adjunct to diet and exercise to: reduce elevated low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (LDL-C) in adults with primary hyperlipidemia ( 1.1 ). reduce LDL-C levels in boys and post-menarchal girls, 10 years to 17 years of age, with heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia (HeFH), unable to reach LDL-C target levels despite an adequate trial of diet and lifestyle modification ( 1.1 ). improve glycemic control in adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus ( 1.2 ). Limitations of Use ( 1.3 ): Do not use for treatment of type 1 diabetes or for diabetic ketoacidosis. Not studied in Fredrickson Type I, III, IV, and V dyslipidemias.
contraindications_original: Obtain lipid parameters, including serum triglyceride (TG) levels, before starting colesevelam hydrochloride tablets ( 2.1 ) The recommended dosage for adults and for boys and post-menarchal girls aged 10 years to 17 years with primary hyperlipidemia is 3.75 grams daily. The recommended dosage for adults with type 2 diabetes mellitus is 3.75 grams daily. Colesevelam hydrochloride tablets should be taken as follows ( 2.2 , 2.4 ): Take 6 tablets once daily or 3 tablets twice daily with a meal and liquid.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Colesevelam hydrochloride tablets, 625 mg are supplied as white to off-white, oval-shaped, film-coated tablets, printed with “COL” on one side with black ink and are available as follows:
                  
                     Bottles of 180 - NDC 69452-158-25
adverseReactions_original:
Colesevelam hydrochloride is contraindicated in patients with:
                  
                     Serum TG concentrations > 500 mg/dL
  
   [see
   
    Warnings and Precautions (5.1)]
  
   
                     
                     History of hypertriglyceridemia-induced pancreatitis
  
   [see
   
    Warnings and Precautions (5.1)]
  
   
                     
                     A history of bowel obstruction
  
   [see
   
    Warnings and Precautions (5.2)]
